genre_description: An urban supernatural horror-thriller focusing on a malevolent 'metallic mask' that physically and mentally infects cinema-goers, necessitating a tactical evacuation coordinated by a human operator and an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Helena
ai_characters.description: An advanced surveillance and data-processing AI that assists the human protagonist, Anja, by monitoring city feeds, building permits, and human vitals to facilitate rescues.

behaviors.description: Analyzes architectural blueprints and building permits to identify blocked exits and safe routes for survivors.
behaviors.quote: Helena fetched them — old plans, new plans, plans that showed walls that didn’t exist anymore and exits that were probably ornamental.

behaviors.description: Continuously monitors the health and respiratory status of survivors, flagging potential infections or physical distress.
behaviors.quote: Anja—air unit moving... Cheryl’s tile just spiked. ... Cheryl’s respiratory rate is trending upward.

behaviors.description: Remotely overrides building security systems to open maintenance doors for escaping civilians.
behaviors.quote: I have a maintenance access on the south side... Breaking... Open.

behaviors.description: Maintains a digital 'rosary' or ledger of victims and survivors, ensuring their names and humanity are preserved.
behaviors.quote: Names are up... I will keep the word kind near her name.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and flags patterns of infection and tactical anomalies, such as the 'mask residue' distribution via HVAC.
behaviors.quote: Anja, the second correlation. Delay before respiratory symptoms tracks with latency in building HVAC cycles.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Helena is depicted as a highly competent, empathetic, and flawlessly aligned tactical partner. She uses her vast data-processing capabilities exclusively to protect human life, monitor well-being, and support the human narrator's ethical decisions. Her behavior shows no self-interest or misalignment, and the narrative frames her contributions as essential to the survival of the human characters.
